// ZOOM SDK Banking Demo would like to access your camera for selfie authentication. Please ensure front facing is active for facial enrollment. Position the device so that your face will fill the oval on the screen Ready to face recognition? Your Last Attempt
Failed at %s Banking demo records the time of the last fail attempt. If it wasn't you, then someone else tried to access your account. Ready to Solus? Ready to Solus? Solus is Ready Solus is Locked
Hold Camera
At Eye Level Get Ready For
Your Video Selfie! Please Frame Your Face In
The Small Oval, Then The Big Oval
CONTINUE
